column4: can dyndns help me get access to my pc which is configured (Internet--AdslModem/Router---Openwrtrouter--pc ... the basic objective is to ssh into my PC and edit the Openwrt router to end up with a Openwrt(running openvpn)--School(web proxy)--Internet---(HomeAdsl/router)--(openwrt router running openvpn) .... but i can't get back home untill the end of this semester ...
most probably not, the firewall wont know what to do with the incomming ssh attempt, unless you have already set it up
the firewall @ school ? i need to tunnel out .. so what's the other alternative ?
er tunneling out of the school is not a big problem. ... i just need the config to let my pc accept ssh connections ... i am a bit confused as the pc is behind two routers ...
